page.title: 01Farming
page.content: On the 15th of May,William,Stewart, Claire and I went to Mr Marsh's farm house,he owns Big Wood Farm.The fourth years are surveying the farms for land cover.He marked on our maps what crops are on his land.There's 121 and a half hectares on his land.The land is only used for crops,but he has 19 sows,2 boars and 93 young pigs.The dominant land cover is Sugar Beet 77 acres, Potatoes 69 acres, Winter Wheat 73 acres,Spring Barley 41 acres,Peas 40 acres. We are now going to Mr Solari.He has no grazing land.The crops are Grass 104 acres, Sugar Beet 77 acres, Potato 124 acres, Barley 125 acres, Wheat 126 acres is the dominant land cover.Eight acres of land is used for buildings.He has 2,000 pigs and 300 beef cattle.
